content: The app has SEVERE latency issues, and does not serve its purpose at all. I emailed the developers a couple weeks ago, and have still not received a response. Don't waste your money on this.
Fix the Bluetooth mic capability. App outputs to headphones but doesn't receive input from microphone.

I recently installed this paid version. But it has following bugs: 1) not working with phone calls with my realme 5i device with android version 10. 2) It uses mobile phone speaker instead of wireless Bluetooth earbuds. So what is happening, even though i am connected with Bluetooth earbud but if my phone is keeping far to me, it produces very slow voice sound as it is using mobiles speaker not headsets. Please fix these two issue, your app is really great, and very helpful to stuttering people
Works well, but would it be possible to add an option to automatically start the auditory feedback when the app starts?
Nowadays I am unable to hear the sound properly
Hi. Just installed paid version on my samsung note 9 & using it with bose soundsport free Bluetooth but i camt hear anything.
Crash everytime i slide delay option :(
Yes, I tried still the same
replyContent: Hi, have you tried turning off the volume boost feature?

content: This app is not up to the mark.... Please refund....
replyContent: Thanks for also getting in touch via our support email support@speechtools.co and we're glad we could help.

content: Returning user - I used this app a few years ago and it was superb though became less effective over time so u installed. Reinstalled today but disappointed. Volume slider doesn't work, neither does lowering the pitch. The email link to speech tools us also broken. I'd love to use this app again but I can't use it effectively until pitch functionality is restored
Thanks for providing an affordable alternative to the Speakeasy in-ear. I've experienced great results with this app.

I bought and installed this app but it crashed. I couldn't even test try it. I sent an email to them but have not received any help yet. XxxAm still having the same problem. I haven't been able to use it...xx Is it available online? I can't find the latest version 5.0.4.Have you uploaded it on Platstore? I have updated it but still not able to use. Is it my phone that is the problem or? Am using Huawei phone. I have not been able to use the app it even for a second...
replyContent: Hi, the last version got stuck going through Google Play but itâ€™s available now.

content: The app is very good. However, I find that when I use bluetooth earbuds, the app keeps using the phone microphone. As a result, the volume is low, and I've found over the years that for DAF FAF to be effective you need high volume, not to hear the sound of your own voice. Personally, I would be more than willing to pay for a perfect FAF DAF app that manages to mask the sound of your voice and guarantees a more reliable experience, and I strongly encourage speechtools to add more tweaks.
replyContent: Hi, we've been adding more features (low latency) and will be looking how to improve further. Thanks for the feedback!

content: It works magic. The only issue that I find (and which is rather important) is that when I use Skype, skype users can't hear me. It seems that it hijacks the microphone.  However apart from that this is a really superb app which is very usefull.
Good simple controls.. Works well with Samsung Buds (bluetooth). It would be nice to have the min delay value above zero to compensate for latency in the procesing of the audio say Mike 40ms ?
The delay at its shortest is far too long rendering it useless. I brought this android app due to its ability to be used in calls however its proving only to be an annoyance.
replyContent: Hi, can you please drop us an email at support@speechtools.co and let us know what device you have and we'll have a look into why the delay is too long for you.

content: Practically useless application.  The "zero" delay is too long for normal speaking.  It's impossible to make a short delay. Cannot use for normal conversation,  public speech  and...... The support not responding.
replyContent: Hi, sorry the delay is too long but some older Android devices can't do short delays.

content: Why the programme doesn't work in background
replyContent: Hi, the app does work in the background on all the devices we've tested with. Can you please get in touch at support@speechtools.co and let us know what device you have and we'll look into it.

content: Great app but we need to rise the volume boost
Since update the advanced settings do not save again when you press the back button on your phone please fix......otherwise amazing app.
replyContent: This has now been fixed, please grab the latest update!

content: the advanced setting does not save when back botton pushed.
replyContent: Thanks for letting us know, we've now fixed that in version 3.11.

content: I tried it and love it.  Almost instantly it lowers my pitch and allows me to talk relaxed no problem.  The only question I have is how do you use it to make phone calls?
I payed for this and it hasn't worked once it crashes everytime, there is a free  software that the same job without crashing. Waste of money
replyContent: Sorry you've had some problems with this version. We've just released an update which will fix this.

content: If you struggle with fluency, try this. I do a lot of public speaking and it's made a huge difference to my confidence. I've been a lifelong stammerer and was very sceptical about it. I was wrong. It's changed everything.  Just try it.

content: THANK YOU FOR THIS!!!  My speech therapist finally hit on DAF as the tool for me, and with your app and the earpiece I just bought, I can take DAF with me wherever I go now!  Too cool!
At the begining I had some problems on my Sony Ericsson Xperia Neo, but after I contacted developer they fixed them, and this newest version works very good.
I put this on my Galaxy to try with clients as an SLT. It had a minor echo at first, and DAF Professional were quick to sort it out. V reasonable Â£.
Was sceptical if this would work but is amazing! Not sure why it works but finding it really helpful so thanks!!
Excellent app. Works great on phone calls on my Desire
